TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23espsSELECT rb.reference_employee_id, rb.reference_id FROM reference_employee_base rb WHERE rb.employee_id = 21208 -- from Martha AND (rb.territory_lov_id IN( SELECT list_of_values_id FROM custom_query_lov_view WHERE custom_list_id = 13 AND custom_level_value = 'CA' -- Canada only --AND retired = 0 we want these ) OR rb.territory_lov_id is null)
